machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M107                  ; Fan off
G28                   ; Home all
M375 P"heightmap.csv" ; Load height map
G1 Z1.0 F6000         ; Move the bed
G92 E0                ; Set extruder position
G1 F200 E30           ; Prime the extruder
G92 E0                ; Set extruder position
M572 D0 S0.06        ;  pressure advance

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G92 E0               ; Set extruder position
G1 E-10 F4200        ; Retract the filament
G92 E0               ; Set extruder position
G1 X-2.5 Y218 F36000 ; Go to home
M104 S0              ; Turn off heating hotend
M140 S0              ; Turn off heating bed
M107                 ; Fan off
M18                  ; Disable all motors
